overview:
Tony is a Technical Recruiter within Riviera Partner’s Contingency search division.

Prior to Riviera, Tony was the Director of Recruiting for 10 years at a small boutique staffing firm that focused on placing both software and hardware engineers throughout the Silicon Valley. Throughout his vast recruiting experience, Tony has worked with small venture funded companies, large public companies and everything in between.

Tony was born and raised in Southern California but his family hails from Ohio and Massachusetts. Tony attended California State University Northridge (CSUN) where he studied Business Administration and was an active member of Sigma Alpha Epsilon, the worldâ€™s largest social fraternity. Him and his wife Jennifer live in Simi Valley with their two boys. When Tony is not working he enjoys sports, especially soccer, home improvement projects and playing with his kids.
